oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Library at Booker T. Washington High School
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Public Education
African American schools; African American students; African American children; African American girls; School libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph of the library at Booker T. Washington High School shows African American students quietly reading and a librarian standing under a poster reading "Silence."
